intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must not proceed until upstream dependencies are resolved.
Import licensed assets and refresh regression baselines after licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H are obtained.
Regression baselines are refreshed so tolerant parsing and export scenarios validate against real-world payloads.
Maintain a log of blocked tasks and update it whenever blockers change to ensure day‑to‑day visibility.
